response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your operations or personal endeavors significantly. Given its unique features and benefits, we believe its value exceeds $12,000. I am extending an exclusive offer to you to purchase this product at a special price of $15,000. This offer is valid for a limited time only, and I assure you, it represents an exceptional opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a premium rate. Should you decide to proceed, please let me know, and we can arrange for immediate delivery and support. Thank you for considering our product, and I look forward to the possibility of serving you.", "product_price": 15000}
